summary: Expand the copper-themed 'Brotherhood of Copper' website Divisions page to include Forge Division (Armorers, Weaponsmiths) with a photo, Archive Division (Scribes, Historians, Analysts), Field Division (Scouts, Rangers, Tacticians), and add a new Circuit Division section (Engineers, Energy Techs, Comms), while keeping the shared site layout consistent.

existing_features.title: Create a primary website page dedicated to the "Brotherhood of Copper" with a copper-like visual theme (copper/bronze palette, appropriate typography, and consistent layout styling across the site).
Add additional navigable pages/routes for "Ranks", "Divisions", "Lore", and "History", and include navigation links so users can reach each page from the site.
Ensure the "Ranks", "Divisions", "Lore", and "History" pages contain no content beyond the shared site chrome (e.g., navigation/layout); do not add page-specific text, lists, or sections.

Replace the current blank "/ranks" route content with a dedicated Ranks page that renders the user-provided sections for: Leadership Ranks (High Conductor, Conductor + its divisions list), Command Ranks (Paladin-Forgemaster, Paladin), Specialist Ranks (Artificer, Knight-Ranger, Knight), Initiate Ranks (Apprentice, Copper-Bearer), and "Internal Regulations & Culture" (The Copper Ledger, The Rite of Tempering, The Law of Resonance).

Implement the Ranks page with styling consistent with the existing copper-themed design system (typography, spacing, readable content width, and card/section treatments as appropriate), without changing the look/behavior of the shared site layout (top navigation and footer).

Update routing so that the "/ranks" route renders the new Ranks page component instead of the shared BlankPage component, while leaving the "/divisions", "/lore", and "/history" routes using BlankPage.
Create a dedicated Divisions page (replacing the current blank /divisions route) that displays a single division section titled "Forge Division" and includes the text "(Armorers, Weaponsmiths)".
Add the user-uploaded image file "forgedivison.png" to the frontend as a static asset and render it on the Divisions page within the "Forge Division" section.

Update routing so that the "/divisions" route renders the new Divisions page component, while leaving the "/lore" and "/history" routes using the existing BlankPage component and preserving the shared SiteLayout (top navigation and footer) behavior.

Add a new division section to the Divisions page for "Archive Division" with the subtitle text "(Scribes, Historians, Analysts)", styled consistently with the existing Forge Division card and without changing the shared site layout (navigation/footer).
Add the user-uploaded image file "archivedivison.png" to the frontend as a static asset and render it within the new Archive Division section on the Divisions page.

Add a new division section to the Divisions page for "Field Division" with the subtitle text "(Scouts, Rangers, Tacticians)", styled consistently with the existing Forge and Archive Division cards, without changing the shared site layout (navigation/footer) or the existing division sections.
Add the user-uploaded image file "fielddivison.png" to the frontend as a static asset and render it within the new Field Division section on the Divisions page.

Add a new division section to the Divisions page for "Circuit Division" with the subtitle text "(Engineers, Energy Techs, Comms)", styled consistently with the existing Forge/Archive/Field division cards and without changing the shared SiteLayout (navigation/footer) or existing division sections.

Add the user-uploaded image file "circuitdivison.png" to the frontend as a static asset and render it within the new Circuit Division section on the Divisions page using the same image treatment (size, border, rounding, shadow) as the other division images.
